recipesJson.name: Charlie Noble's PB Cereal
recipesJson.author: DataNotAnecdotes

reviews.text: Seriously i dont get this recipe. Maybe i oversteeped by waiting 3 weeks before trying it or maybe because i didnt have any saline. But i neither get a truely PB flavor from it but not really a cereal flavor either. All i get is a creamy bakery vibe which would not be idifyable in any way if i wouldnt know what im vaping. Its not a bad taste but also nothing i would see me mixing this recipe again.

A tasty recipe indeed. I personally prefer to swap out the PB from TPA for the one from CAP; it just seems to facilitate more of a PB cereal kind of vibe imho. I find TPA PB to be a bit dry in comparison. A half percent of CAP SS isn't a bad idea either (I have a revolting sweet tooth).  :-)
